thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 6 of 178
thread.title: Alex

author: Alex
title: Alex
text: I have been very happy with the site so far. I have two house sits in the last 6 months. Both sitters have been different but good, and it has been a very relaxed experience overall. I still have some worries to leave my house and cat with someone else, but so far have been really please with how things have gone. I would (and am actually) recommending to friends and family, and will definitely keep using the site.
